answers.text:
Hi Evelina,
We've posted an article about promoting tourism to the local “stay-cation” audience on our website. http://ow.ly/21wyw
There is plenty of anecdotal evidence in the tourism industry that the popularity of “stay-cations” has surged since the recession began. http://ow.ly/21wyw

answers.text:
Evelina,
The Rocky Mountain communities that I have been talking to seem to trying to weather the downtown by promoting special events and keep something always going on to attract the nearby tourist to return throughout the summer.

author: Evelina Moulder
text: For tourism-based economies, an economic downturn can present huge challenges. Has anyone had success with new tactics to attract tourists?
title: Creative Ideas for Attracting Tourism
